products.title: Faux Suede Barley Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Faux Suede Barley Roman Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £15.58 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roman Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Capture the perfect finish to your windows with this fantastic faux suede Roman Blind. 
 
Our Faux Suede Deluxe range of fabric has proven to be one of our most popular roman blinds and curtains for many years. Still, at the forefront of fashion, this fabric makes sumptuous Roman blinds and curtains to enhance your home interior. 
 
The Faux Suede Barley Roman blind is a lovely cream colour and is an excellent way to enhance your home at an affordable price. 
 
Quality is important to us and we therefore check your blind at multiple stages in its manufacture to ensure you receive the perfect blindfor your home. Don’t just take our word for it, we are proud that our customers vote us ‘excellent’ on Trustpilot. 
 
 Product ID: DB-ROM0001 Fabric Colour: Barley Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining Headrail: Durable White Headrail with Top or Face Fix Brackets.     Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation - Great for a Durable, Even Finish Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Marseille Smoke Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Marseille Smoke Roman Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £34.98 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roman Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Marseille range is a set of wonderful Roman blinds in soft colours that will give the room a unique look.  
 This beautiful grey Roman blind with a nice texture will add a touch of elegance to your room.  
 
 Product ID: DB-AROM0834 Fabric Colour: Smoke Material: 54% Viscose 46% Polyester Headrail: White Metal Headrail     Control Type: Sidewinder Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes
